item.title:
Shellback crabs are among some of the most interesting decapod crustaceans. They can bear a whole clamshell that is larger than their body size. Through a mechanism of suction created by the membranous body, the shell is held firmly in place
[read more: https://t.co/ZuKMH2GJTK] https://t.co/Qdxymul6d3
